overview: In this newest installment of Sweetheart's top selling series, four vignettes come together to tell a hot, sexy story. Lovely, tormented teen Bree Daniels seeks help from Ava Addams, a sexy, earthy older woman who is a spiritual healer. Ava helps Bree find herself through multiple orgasms...meanwhile, Bree's school friend, Adriana Chechik, is obsessed with Bree's famous author mom, played by Alana Evans. Adriana comes by to ask Alana for an autograph, and ends up seducing her...after visiting Alana, art gallery owner Dana Vespoli has to drive her Polish host daughter to the airport, only to be hit on by the younger, Eastern European beauty...finally, Dana's daughter Sara Luvv meets Nina Elle, a controversial artist who stops by to leave some samples, and samples some of young Sara in the process...each scene delivers heart pounding, gorgeous lesbian sex and earth shattering orgasms.
title: Mother Lovers Society 12
